search.query: index=scoreboard Result=* user!=admin `get_user_info` | top limit=1 Team
index=scoreboard Result=* user!=admin `get_user_info` | append [ | stats count | fields - count | eval Team="No recent activity." ] | top limit=1 Team

index=scoreboard Result=* user!=admin `get_user_info` | dedup vcode | rename BasePointsAwarded as Points | rename SpeedBonusAwarded as Bonus | eval "Additional Bonus" = AdditionalBonusAwarded | rename DisplayUsername as User | lookup ctf_badges BadgeNumber as BadgeNumber | eval Type = case( Result=="Correct" OR Result=="Incorrect", "Answer Submitted", Result=="Hint", "Hint Purchased", Result=="Badge", "Badge Received", Result="Bonus", "Additional Bonus") | eval "Question/Badge" = case( Result=="Correct" OR Result=="Incorrect", QuestionOfficial, Result=="Hint", "We can't put that here, silly!", Result=="Badge", BadgeDescription, Result="Bonus", "Wouldn't you like to know?") | sort - _time | convert timeformat="%a %H:%M" ctime(_time) | rename _time as "Date/Time" | rename QuestionOfficial as Question | eval Points = coalesce(Points, 0) | eval Bonus = coalesce(Bonus, 0) | eval "Additional Bonus" = coalesce(AdditionalBonusAwarded, 0) | eval Penalty = coalesce(Penalty, 0) | table "Date/Time" Team Type Number BadgeNumber "Question/Badge" Result Points Bonus "Additional Bonus" Penalty
